Name: GTIME Layer
Title: Multitemporal Vegetation Change Dynamics 2018 – 2021 – 2024
Description: The RGB colour model is used to visualize vegetation status and changes across three user-defined time periods (in this case: T1: 2018, T2: 2021, and T3: 2024). This vegetation change model is based on a semantic Earth Observation (EO) data cube, utilizing all available Sentinel-2 observations within each time frame. It calculates the percentage of vegetation presence among valid (cloud- and snow-free) observations. As a result, the model not only depicts changes over time but also reflects variations in vegetation intensity and transitions between vegetation and non-vegetation. Vegetation percentages are represented as integer values within the respective colour channels.

Resources.Name: COG source
Resources.Attribution: Developed by the University of Salzburg, Department of Geoinformatics - Z_GIS & Spatial Services with funding from the Austrian Research Promotion Agency (FFG) under the Austrian Space Application Programme (ASAP) within the project INTERFACE (contract no: FO999892652) and under the Digital Twin Austria Programme within the project GTIME (contract no: FO999918383).
